body:
Updates:

Rob Hudson did a gist of some packets at  https://gist.github.com/robhudson/0678665c205ce02c0976c0956fa4d809

1.  Sampling rate *probably* works.  He gets 0.5% of nightly.  We expected 1%.  This could have something to do with vagaries of Nightly sessions being short, or bots or who knows.
2.  Tagging with branch works.
3.  Proportional assignment works.
4.  Unclear if constant (deterministic) assignment works, because I forgot to ask.
5.  Unknown if value setting works.

Re point 5:  So, we chose a pref that isn't instrumented in telemetry.  I suggest we re-try this with a different pref, as will be seen by UT.  

Code:  https://dxr.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/source/toolkit/components/telemetry/TelemetryEnvironment.jsm#158
body_text:
Updates:
Rob Hudson did a gist of some packets at  https://gist.github.com/robhudson/0678665c205ce02c0976c0956fa4d809

Sampling rate probably works.  He gets 0.5% of nightly.  We expected 1%.  This could have something to do with vagaries of Nightly sessions being short, or bots or who knows.
Tagging with branch works.
Proportional assignment works.
Unclear if constant (deterministic) assignment works, because I forgot to ask.
Unknown if value setting works.

Re point 5:  So, we chose a pref that isn't instrumented in telemetry.  I suggest we re-try this with a different pref, as will be seen by UT.
Code:  https://dxr.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/source/toolkit/components/telemetry/TelemetryEnvironment.jsm#158
body_html:
Updates:

Rob Hudson did a gist of some packets at https://gist.github.com/robhudson/0678665c205ce02c0976c0956fa4d809

  1. Sampling rate probably works. He gets 0.5% of nightly. We expected 1%. This could have something to do with vagaries of Nightly sessions being short, or bots or who knows.
  2. Tagging with branch works.
  3. Proportional assignment works.
  4. Unclear if constant (deterministic) assignment works, because I forgot to ask.
  5. Unknown if value setting works.

Re point 5: So, we chose a pref that isn't instrumented in telemetry. I suggest we re-try this with a different pref, as will be seen by UT.

Code: https://dxr.mozilla.org/mozilla-central/source/toolkit/components/telemetry/TelemetryEnvironment.jsm#158
